summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Crescent Drive from East Galer Street to Twenty-fourth Avenue North et al in the City of Seattle, by paving sewer with asphalt under Ordinance No. 19840, creating Local Improvement District No. 1922 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
